titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Institute for Environmental Conflict Resolution.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 7/30/2007--Introduced. Amends the Morris K. Udall Scholarship and Excellence in National Environmental and Native American Public Policy Act of 1992 to authorize the appropriation to the Environmental Dispute Resolution Fund for FY2008-FY2012 of such sums as may be necessary for operating costs of the United States Institute for Environmental Conflict Resolution.
